TopicTitle: Orion - Trial By Fire - Jeb, Bill and Bob talk about NASA's Mission

Articles.Content:
Orion Trial By Fire NASA latest and greatest achivement for manned spaceflight. The Kerbals have taken up the challenge of trying to beat NASA by racing them with their own Orion space flight, like NASA this test flight is not manned but it is Kerballed well their much tougher than Humans.

Join Jeb Bill and Bob as they test the Orion spacecraft and talk about the mission.

There is also a thanks to NASA at the end of this video, thank you for inspiring us and pushing back the boundaries of science and spaceflight.

Check out NASA's Orion mission here:

http://www.nasa.gov/orion/
